Summary: Cloaking Black object at tree line
divs: sighting detailsdriving home from work 20 min ago, as i was driving down my wooded street a very black object about twice the size of my truck looking somewhat like a sheet of black paper?the way it was bending\flying just appeared at the top of the trees. i tried to chase it with my vehicle but i lost sight of it right away.
